participant_1.background:
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I like to relax by looking through my antique collection.
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
i ride a unicycle.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

participant_2.background:
I read children's books to make myself feel younger.
i married miss usa.
I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea.
i race cars for a living.
i am in love with adam levine.

content.text: Hey! What is your favorite way to relax?
I love to read children's books. I find that they help me to feel younger and more carefree.
That is interesting! I used to read a lot more, but I find that I am more drawn to websites these days.
I also like to go on websites, but I find that I spend most of my time on sites about cats and fashion.
I love cats! I have two of my own.
Me too! I have three cats and a dog.
Wow! That is a lot of animals!
I know, but I love them all!
What do you do for a living?
I am a race car driver.
That is awesome! I have always been interested in racing.
It is a lot of fun, but it can also be dangerous.
I can imagine! What do you do for fun outside of work?
I love spending time with my family and friends. We love to go out to eat and take trips together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family and friends too.
I am glad! It is important to make time for the people you love.
I agree! Thank you for chatting with me!
You are welcome! It was nice talking to you!
